title: The power of stating InshaAllah from the heart: The secret of saying " In God's will " on a constant basis
description: This shot 10 pages book let you understand the power of saying " InshaAllah " or " In God's will " from the heart, not blurts it from our busy analyzing mind as most people do. " In God's will " this book may transform your life simply by understanding the reason or the bigger picture of keeping this phrase alive in the heart at the end of our plans and actions.Whether you are religios or not, you will see the results. This phrase will keep you humble, protect you from negative emotions in the 21st century where most poeple are exhausted, anxious, depressed.
author: Unknown
